text: We will hear arguments next in McElroy against the United States.
Chief Justice Burger, may it please the Court, this case involves the question of statutory construction of the third paragraph of Section 2314.

Thank you, Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court, this case is here on a writ of certiorari limited to the issue of the proper scope of the interstate commerce requirement in Section 2314 of Title XVIII of the United States Code.
